# Email Templates Library

**Owner:** Shawn • **Visibility:** Internal

- **Intake confirm (neutral):** “Your appointment details — Case [CASE_ID]”. Bring voucher; reply to reschedule.  
- **Clinic intro:** scope + cap + expiry + discount + preferred times; invoice net‑15; Case ID only.  
- **Invoice mismatch:** expected vs invoice; ask to confirm discount/co‑pay lines.  
- **Thank‑you (clinic):** appreciation + slot usage summary.  
- **Reschedule:** propose 2–3 windows; confirm.  
- **Cancellation:** confirm cancellation; void voucher.  
- **Incident pause:** “We’re pausing communications on this case; will follow up soon.”
